resources.string: Please enter your ID to begin.
When you click the button below, please scroll to the StudySync entry and permit usage access.
Your usage data is now being shared with the study.
You do not need to do anything.
Simply keep the app installed for the duration of the study.\n\nThank you for your participation!
Stay under the daily limit to earn your reward!
Stay under the daily limit to hit your target!
You have been selected for an additional branch of the study.
The study is now over. Thank you for participating!

Please check your email for the endline survey. Upon completion of the endline survey, your total earnings from the study (if applicable) along with $x for completing the surveys will be paid to your nominated PayID account within a week. If you have any questions, please contact the research team at unswsmartphonestudy@gmail.com.
